name: Space Hero (ROOOOCKSTAR)
description:
PLAY FULLSCREEN ON THE WEB VERSION

--------------

Save the universe and destroy the meteor by reactivating disabled rockets !

--------------

How to play

Click on the rockets to reboot them and destroy the meteor before it's too late !

Rockets are randomly generated so each run is unique !

--------------

Other

Game made for the One Minute Game Jam #4

Executable file available

Sprites, music and some vfx entirely made by me.

Sound effects are from a free asset pack.
